turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Joe, do you have time to order some coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can pick it up on the way out to my next meeting at noon. Can you order from Starbucks on Market St.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it now or closer to noon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If you can order it closer to around noon, that would be great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me send you a menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me know when you're ready and I can order it for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can you please order me a venti soy white chocolate mocha with no foam?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm debating if I want to grab something to eat

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Their salads are pretty good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, can you grab me a salad too? Anything is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make that two white chocolate mochas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I just order two white mochas and a salad for you. It'll be ready to be picked up at the Starbucks on Market Street in about 20 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This is perfect, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem
